String.string: I'm sure salt will make it safe to eat.
Kill {@creature:47#1001#Tirkai grizzlies} in the {@Rgn:47002$$Whitefrost Forest} southeast of {@Rgn:77001$$Pathfinder Post} and collect their meat.
Go to {@Rgn:47006$$Field Base Lunacy} and deliver the bear meat to {@creature:247#1001$$Jadora}.
